sections.intro: In semester 6, the portfolio assesses my skill level and my ability to demonstrate it with argued evidence (SAEs, internships, apprenticeship).
sections.methodTxt: I link each project to targeted skills. For each piece of evidence, I state context, constraints, choices, and analyze results & improvement areas.
sections.growthTxt: From S1 to S6: increased complexity (security, monitoring, automation), professionalization (tooling, documentation), and collaboration.
sections.evidenceTxt: I select varied evidence: anonymized configs, scripts, screenshots, monitoring dashboards, procedures, metrics (RTO, MTTR).
